name: Chezz (Double Top Games)
description:
*THE WEB VERSION IS BUGGED, DOWNLOAD THE GAME INSTEAD!*

Searching for a land to rule, the king stumbled upon an abandoned forest. The problem is that another monarch is already trying to conquer the place. Defeat his army or claim the throne first to win!

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/epic-8-bit-music
